meanings: (청결하다, 말끔하다) (neat and) clean, (informal) spick and span; (먼지 한 점 없을 정도로) spotless
식사 매너 Please eat more properly.
실용회화-관계가 안 좋을 때 All right. Let's break it off cleanly.
실용회화-이발소 · 미용실 Clean it up all around.

vlive.korean: [불꽃 자존심] 우리 깨끗하게 하자, 깨끗하게! [Proud man] Let's play a fair game. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Proud man] Let's play a fair game.

vlive.korean: 진짜 깨끗하게 낸다 - 어떻게 한다고요, 정우? So nice and neat. - How, JUNGWOO? 듣기 View video ALL THE K-POP : [주간아이돌] 기습 라이브 with NCT 127
vlive.english: So nice and neat. - How, JUNGWOO?

vlive.korean: 우리 칼로 자를 땐 생각보다 깨끗하게 잘리죠? It's a lot neater than using a knife, right? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.13
vlive.english: It's a lot neater than using a knife, right?

vlive.korean: 손 항상 깨끗하게 씻고 물도 많이 드시고요, 알았죠? Wash your hands and drink a lot of water. 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 성화랑 얘기해욥🤗 오늘은 성화 Time~
vlive.english: Wash your hands and drink a lot of water.

vlive.korean: 저희가 얼마나 깨끗하게 정말 관리를... You would be surprised if you see how clean our room is... 듣기 View video NCT : VOICE ONLY ㅋ
vlive.english: You would be surprised if you see how clean our room is...

examples.korean: Don’t track mud on my clean floor. 발음듣기 깨끗하게 닦아 놓은 바닥에 발자국 남기지 마. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t track mud on my clean floor. 발음

examples.korean: She keeps the house spotless. 발음듣기 그녀는 집을 티끌 하나 없이 깨끗하게 해 둔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She keeps the house spotless. 발음

examples.korean: Keep your room neat and clean. 발음듣기 방을 깨끗하게 정돈해 두어라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Keep your room neat and clean. 발음

examples.korean: We are asking everyone to keep the employee coffee lounge clean. 발음듣기 직원용 커피 라운지를 깨끗하게 쓰시기 바랍니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: We are asking everyone to keep the employee coffee lounge clean. 발음

examples.korean: His deskscape is always neat and tidy. 발음듣기 그의 책상은 언제나 깨끗하게 정리정돈되어 있다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: His deskscape is always neat and tidy. 발음
